subject: ATHLETICS AND SPORTS
MARATHON RUNNING
BOSTON MARATHON
lead_paragraph: Most of us try to avoid the heat, but a surprising number of adventurers go the extra mile to seek it out. Take Margaret Morgan and her husband, Peter Clist, both British consultants in their 50s. Or the 43-year-old Moroccan native Aziz el-Akad. And of course, Gudrun Dautel and her husband, Hans Martin, Germans in their 60s.
snippet: Would you sign up for a 250-kilometer race through the Sahara?
